description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期地下党员，与李克农、胡底并称“龙潭三杰”。在长征途中牺牲。
description.en: An early underground member of the Chinese Communist Party, known as one of the 'Three Heroes of the Dragon's Lair' along with Li Kenong and Hu Di. He died during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞的发妻。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞的第二位妻子，医生。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei's second wife, a doctor.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江省湖州市的一所中学。
description.en: A middle school located in Huzhou, Zhejiang Province.

nodes.id: 国立北京医学专门学校

zh-cn: 国立北京医学专门学校

description.zh-cn: 北京大学医学部的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of Peking University Health Science Center.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张振华的二弟，介绍钱壮飞加入中国共产党。
description.en: The second younger brother of Zhang Zhenhua, who introduced Qian Zhuangfei to the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期情报人员，与钱壮飞、李克农并称“龙潭三杰”。
description.en: An early intelligence officer of the Chinese Communist Party, known as one of the 'Three Heroes of the Dragon's Lair' along with Qian Zhuangfei and Li Kenong.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党特务组织“中统”的创建者之一，曾是钱壮飞在国民党内的直接上司。
description.en: One of the founders of the Kuomintang's secret service organization 'Zhongtong', and was Qian Zhuangfei's direct superior within the KMT.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央特别行动科

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央特别行动科

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期的情报和政治保卫机关。
description.en: An early intelligence and political security agency of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾是钱壮飞在中共党内的上级。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and was Qian Zhuangfei's superior within the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾是钱壮飞在中共中央特科的领导之一。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and one of Qian Zhuangfei's leaders in the CCP Central Special Action Section.

nodes.id: 中央组织部党务调查科

zh-cn: 中央组织部党务调查科

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党的特务组织。
description.en: A secret service organization of the Kuomintang (KMT).

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党情报工作杰出领导者，与钱壮飞、胡底并称“龙潭三杰”。
description.en: An outstanding leader in the intelligence work of the Chinese Communist Party, known as one of the 'Three Heroes of the Dragon's Lair' along with Qian Zhuangfei and Hu Di.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央特科负责人，1931年被捕后叛变，其叛变直接导致钱壮飞身份暴露。
description.en: The former head of the CCP Central Special Action Section, who defected after being arrested in 1931. His defection directly led to the exposure of Qian Zhuangfei's identity.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在中共中央特科值班时接收了钱壮飞发出的关于顾顺章叛变的警报。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who received the warning from Qian Zhuangfei about Gu Shunzhang's defection while on duty at the CCP Central Special Action Section.

description.zh-cn: 第一次国共内战时期中国共产党建立的中心革命根据地。
description.en: The central revolutionary base established by the Chinese Communist Party during the First Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军进行的战略性大转移。
description.en: A major strategic retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 贵州金沙县当地民团分子，被认为是杀害钱壮飞的凶手。
description.en: A local militia member in Jinsha County, Guizhou, believed to be the murderer of Qian Zhuangfei.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞与徐双英的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Xu Shuangying.

description.zh-cn: 钱椒的丈夫，曾是中共交通员。
description.en: The husband of Qian Jiao, who was a CCP courier.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞与徐双英的儿子。
description.en: The son of Qian Zhuangfei and Xu Shuangying.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞与张振华的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞与张振华的女儿，后成为著名电影明星。
description.en: The daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua, who later became a famous film star.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞与张振华的儿子，后成为中国电影摄影师、导演。
description.en: The son of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua, who later became a Chinese cinematographer and director.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，国民革命军与新四军之间的一次冲突。
description.en: A clash between the National Revolutionary Army and the New Fourth Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1938年在延安创办的综合性艺术学院。
description.en: A comprehensive art academy founded by the Chinese Communist Party in Yan'an in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安时期创办的第一所理工科大学。
description.en: The first science and engineering university founded by the Chinese Communist Party during the Yan'an period.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞于1913年与发妻徐双英结婚，1931年身份暴露后二人再未见面。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei married his first wife Xu Shuangying in 1913; they never met again after his identity was exposed in April 1931.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞于1919年10月与第二位妻子张振华结婚。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei married his second wife Zhang Zhenhua in October 1919.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞于1908年入湖州中学求学。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei enrolled in Huzhou Middle School in 1908.

relationships.target: 国立北京医学专门学校

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞于1914年考入国立北京医学专门学校，1919年毕业。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei was admitted to the National Beijing Medical College in 1914 and graduated in 1919.

relationships.target: 国立北京医学专门学校

description.zh-cn: 张振华于1914年与钱壮飞一同考入国立北京医学专门学校，1919年毕业。
description.en: Zhang Zhenhua was admitted to the National Beijing Medical College along with Qian Zhuangfei in 1914 and graduated in 1919.

description.zh-cn: 张暹中于1926年介绍钱壮飞加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zhang Xianzhang introduced Qian Zhuangfei to join the Chinese Communist Party in 1926.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞于1926年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1926.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞在打入国民党特务机关后，担任徐恩曾的机要秘书，深获其信任。
description.en: After infiltrating the Kuomintang's secret service agency, Qian Zhuangfei served as Xu Enzeng's confidential secretary and gained his deep trust.

relationships.target: 中央组织部党务调查科

description.zh-cn: 1929年底，钱壮飞奉中共中央特科之命打入徐恩曾组建的国民党特务组织。
description.en: At the end of 1929, under the order of the CCP Central Special Action Section, Qian Zhuangfei infiltrated the Kuomintang secret service organization established by Xu Enzeng.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央特别行动科

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞是中共中央特科的重要成员。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei was an important member of the CCP Central Special Action Section.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞在中共中央特科的工作直接由周恩来、陈赓等人领导。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei's work in the CCP Central Special Action Section was directly led by Zhou Enlai, Chen Geng, and others.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞在中共中央特科的工作直接由周恩来、陈赓等人领导。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei's work in the CCP Central Special Action Section was directly led by Zhou Enlai, Chen Geng, and others.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞利用其特殊地位，将李克农引入国民党特务组织卧底。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei used his special position to introduce Li Kenong as an undercover agent into the Kuomintang's secret service organization.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞利用其特殊地位，将胡底引入国民党特务组织卧底。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei used his special position to introduce Hu Di as an undercover agent into the Kuomintang's secret service organization.

description.zh-cn: 与胡底并称“龙潭三杰”，在中共中央特科领导下协同工作。
description.en: Known as one of the 'Three Heroes of the Dragon's Lair' along with Hu Di, they worked together under the leadership of the CCP Central Special Action Section.

description.zh-cn: 与李克农并称“龙潭三杰”，在中共中央特科领导下协同工作。
description.en: Known as one of the 'Three Heroes of the Dragon's Lair' along with Li Kenong, they worked together under the leadership of the CCP Central Special Action Section.

description.zh-cn: 1931年4月被捕后叛变，供述了中共在上海的全部组织人员名单，对中共地下组织造成了巨大的威胁。
description.en: After his arrest in April 1931, he defected and confessed the entire list of CCP organization members in Shanghai, posing a huge threat to the CCP's underground organizations.

description.zh-cn: 截获顾顺章叛变的密电后，及时将消息传给中共中央，使周恩来等领导人得以脱险。
description.en: After intercepting the secret telegram about Gu Shunzhang's defection, he promptly passed the information to the CCP Central Committee, allowing leaders like Zhou Enlai to escape.

description.zh-cn: 将顾顺章叛变的消息成功传递给在中共中央特科值班的聂荣臻。
description.en: Successfully delivered the news of Gu Shunzhang's defection to Nie Rongzhen, who was on duty at the CCP Central Special Action Section.

description.zh-cn: 通过及时传递情报，挫败了因顾顺章叛变而可能导致的中共中央机关被摧毁的危机。
description.en: By timely delivering intelligence, he thwarted the crisis of the potential destruction of the CCP central organs caused by Gu Shunzhang's defection.

description.zh-cn: 钱壮飞在长征途中失踪并被杀害。
description.en: Qian Zhuangfei disappeared and was killed during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 根据调查，钱壮飞在贵州金沙县被当地民团分子聂丛山杀害。
description.en: According to investigations, Qian Zhuangfei was killed by local militia member Nie Congshan in Jinsha County, Guizhou.

description.zh-cn: 钱椒是钱壮飞与徐双英的女儿。
description.en: Qian Jiao is the daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Xu Shuangying.

description.zh-cn: 钱椒是钱壮飞与徐双英的女儿。
description.en: Qian Jiao is the daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Xu Shuangying.

description.zh-cn: 钱椒的丈夫是刘杞夫。
description.en: Qian Jiao's husband was Liu Qifu.

description.zh-cn: 钱一平是钱壮飞与徐双英的儿子。
description.en: Qian Yiping is the son of Qian Zhuangfei and Xu Shuangying.

description.zh-cn: 钱一平是钱壮飞与徐双英的儿子。
description.en: Qian Yiping is the son of Qian Zhuangfei and Xu Shuangying.

description.zh-cn: 钱叶丽是钱壮飞与张振华的女儿。
description.en: Qian Yeli is the daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua.

description.zh-cn: 钱叶丽是钱壮飞与张振华的女儿。
description.en: Qian Yeli is the daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua.

description.zh-cn: 黎莉莉（原名钱榛榛）是钱壮飞与张振华的女儿。
description.en: Li Lili (born Qian Zhenzhen) is the daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua.

description.zh-cn: 黎莉莉（原名钱榛榛）是钱壮飞与张振华的女儿。
description.en: Li Lili (born Qian Zhenzhen) is the daughter of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua.

description.zh-cn: 钱江（原名钱镗）是钱壮飞与张振华的儿子。
description.en: Qian Jiang (born Qian Tang) is the son of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua.

description.zh-cn: 钱江（原名钱镗）是钱壮飞与张振华的儿子。
description.en: Qian Jiang (born Qian Tang) is the son of Qian Zhuangfei and Zhang Zhenhua.

description.zh-cn: 1941年皖南事变后，周恩来安排钱江赴延安参加革命。
description.en: After the New Fourth Army Incident in 1941, Zhou Enlai arranged for Qian Jiang to go to Yan'an to join the revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1941年皖南事变后，周恩来安排钱一平赴延安参加革命。
description.en: After the New Fourth Army Incident in 1941, Zhou Enlai arranged for Qian Yiping to go to Yan'an to join the revolution.

description.zh-cn: 钱江到达延安后进入鲁迅艺术学院学习。
description.en: After arriving in Yan'an, Qian Jiang studied at the Lu Xun Academy of Fine Arts.

description.zh-cn: 钱一平到达延安后进入延安自然科学院学习。
description.en: After arriving in Yan'an, Qian Yiping studied at the Yan'an Academy of Natural Sciences.
